CustomField.description: The type of router: - Redirect: Redirects to an internal Salesforce page - Record: Searches for a particular Salesforce record using a passed in parameter and query - Apex: Utilizes a custom Apex class to perform routing based on a passed in parameter
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The type of router: - Redirect: Redirects to an internal Salesforce page - Record: Searches for a particular Salesforce record using a passed in parameter and query - Apex: Utilizes a custom Apex class to perform routing based on a passed in parameter
CustomField.label: Type
